name: s3fv2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs3(c2, c3, c0), nat2), c0))

stmt.origin: cats1fvn(c0, c1, cs3(c2, c3, c0), nat2, cs2(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs3(c2, c3, c0), nat2), c0))
-| wceq(cs3(c2, c3, c0), co(cs2(c2, c3), cconcat, cs1(c0)))
-| wcel(cs2(c2, c3), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c2, c3)), nat2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs3(c2, c3, c0), nat2), c0))
-| wceq(cs3(c2, c3, c0), co(cs2(c2, c3), cconcat, cs1(c0)))
-| wcel(cs2(c2, c3), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c2, c3)), nat2)

body.origin: |- wceq(cs3(c2, c3, c0), co(cs2(c2, c3), cconcat, cs1(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs3(c2, c3, c0), nat2), c0))
-| wcel(cs2(c2, c3), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c2, c3)), nat2)

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs3(c2, c3, c0), nat2), c0))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c2, c3)), nat2)
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs3(c2, c3, c0), nat2), c0))

comment: Extract the third symbol from a length 3 string. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2017.)
